description: Obtains information about which Amazon SNS topics receive status messages from the specified directory. If no input parameters are provided, such as DirectoryId or TopicName, this request describes all of the associations in the account.

parameters.name: TopicNames
parameters.description: A list of Amazon SNS topic names for which to obtain the information. If this member is null, all associations for the specified Directory ID are returned. An empty list results in an InvalidParameterException being thrown. (string) ---

nested_items.name: EventTopics
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon SNS topic names that receive status messages from the specified Directory ID.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The Directory ID of an Directory Service directory that will publish status messages to an Amazon SNS topic.

nested_items.name: TopicName
nested_items.description: The name of an Amazon SNS topic the receives status messages from the directory.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon SNS topic ARN (Amazon Resource Name).

nested_items.name: CreatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of when you associated your directory with the Amazon SNS topic.
